interaction.name: Question 2
interaction.title: A signal generator with a negligible internal resistance RS is connected to a resistor R=10kΩ through a coupling capacitor C=1µF . The upper cut off frequency is fH & lower cut off frequency is fL

responses.response: fH and fL can not be determined from given data

interaction.name: Question 4
interaction.title: Given the approximate equivalent circuit of an amplifier. R=effective output impedance of the amplifier C=effective capacitance across the output of the amplifier. Vout=Signal output voltage when no load is connected. R=250Ω and C=200pF. fH and fL are upper and lower cut off frequency respectively.
